structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: If the program participant obtains a name change, the participant loses certification as a program participant. A participant who has obtained a legal name change may apply to the secretary for recertification in the program if documentation of the legal name change is provided.

If there is a change in the residential street address from the one listed on the application, unless the program participant provides the secretary with notice of the change in such manner as the secretary shall provide by regulation.
Pursuant to paragraph (5) of section 2, the secretary shall cancel certification of a program participant who knowingly provides false information.
